attributes.action: Directly fund Next Generation Digital Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Next Generation Fund levy of 50 pence per month on all fixed copper lines is an unwelcome garnishing of disposable income. What would prevent similar financial measures elsewhere in our society being imposed by Government? Surely society already pays a heavy price for a lack of Government foresight?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
